transcript:
Customer: [inaudible]
Executive: [inaudible] aur dikhao.
Customer: [inaudible]
Executive: Bada din kaunsa din hota hai bari?
Customer: [inaudible]
Executive: Hmm. Kaunsi date ko aata hai?
Customer: 25.
Executive: December.
Customer: Hello.
Customer: December.
Executive: Hello. Sanjay sir good afternoon Vasundhara bol rahi hu IndiaMART se senior manager kaise hai aap sir?
Customer: Kya bol rahe hai?
Executive: Sir Vasundhara bol rahi hu IndiaMART se senior manager kaise hai aap sir?
Customer: Theek hu.
Executive: Achcha sir aap se na abhi discussion hua tha Vidushi ka. To I think aapke pass ek feedback ke liye WhatsApp gaya tha to aapne usme not satisfied mark kiya hai. Mai jaan sakti hu sir ki kya issue aa raha hai matlab kya response nahi aa raha sahi se ya better services nahi mil rahi account manager ke end se?
Customer: Issue issue same hai same issue hai aapka kya hai account manager aap bar bar badalte ho. Mere ko har bar unko batana padta hai kya problem hai mere ko.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Ha same issue jo last last time maine bataya tha wohi issue hai.
Executive: Achcha sir dekhiye pehle jo abhi aapke account manager the to abhi dekhiye kya hota hai na koi may be company left kar jata hai ya kisi ka promotion. Main main aapki baat samajh gaya na aap aap aap customer ko satisfy nahi kar pate to seedhe account manager change kar dete to mere ko har bar har usko discuss karna padta hai to unko pura detail batana padta hai.
Executive: [inaudible]
Customer: Problem same hai aapke meri baat suniye na iske pehle kaun the account manager?
Executive: [inaudible]
Executive: Yaha pe na kuch process may bhi change hua tha jiski wajah se sari company matlab transfer hui thi dusre dusre account manager ko may be iski wajah se bhi aapko laga hoga ki account manager change kar diya and definitely aisa kuch change nahi hua hai sir. Baki ki jo Vidushi services aapko provide kar rahi hai aisa nahi hai sir wo better service nahi provide kar sakti. Aap ek bar short me bata denge.
Customer: Are main wo baat nahi bol raha hu. Mai jo bol raha hu aap pehle wo samajhiye na main nahi bol raha hu ki Vidushi aap handle nahi kar sakti lekin main kya hai har bar har aadmi ko main discuss karu wohi cheez wohi problem fir mere ko jo face ho rahi fir usse discuss karu fir usme wo apna wo opinion denge ki aap aisa kar lijiye aisa kar lijiye.
Executive: Hmm. Mai uske liye bol raha hu.
Executive: Achcha dekhiye mai abhi aapko kuch concern dekhi thi jo pehle bhi aapke Amit Singh jo account manager the unse discussion bhi hua tha ki aapko jo leads chahiye wo bulk order ki chahiye matlab minimum order quantity hai na 20 metric ton chahiye aapki right. To Vidushi ko mai ek bar bata dungi ki usme aapka feedback wala action cross check nahi kiya tha may be directly aapko call kar diya agar pehle wo call karti to wo aapka dekh pati ki kya kya pehle baat hui hai aur kya kis way se aapne unko bataya tha. Mai ek bar unko bol dungi baki ki rahi order value filter wali baat to sir dekhiye filter option humne waha pe diya hua hai waha se bhi filter kar sakte hai. Abhi se jo hum deal kar rahe hai product line me.
Customer: Wahi problem hai mere ko.
Customer: Are hum filter karenge to lead aayengi usi me usi me filter karenge na.
Executive: Definitely sir.
Customer: Jo meri lead aayi hongi usi ko filter karunga na mai.
Executive: Hmm hmm.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: To mai kya dekh rahi thi abhi mai kuch aapki lead bhi cross check kar rahi thi. Abhi matlab apna jo metric ton jo aap bol rahe hai 20 to matlab itna isse niche aap nahi order wali deliver karte sir?
Customer: Nahi karte mera transporting issue aata hai na mai to wohi problem to bata raha hu aapko ab 50 kilo 100 kilo mai bhejunga courier service mere ko costly pad jayegi mera product cheap hai koi valuable to hai nahi ki usko matlab cost uski badh jayegi to to matlab kehna chahiye wo usko pusata nahi hai cost badh jati hai product ki.
Executive: Ha kyuki mai check kar rahi thi wahi aapke pass kafi sari lead jo hai wo matlab 500 kg ki hai aur matlab minimum quantity jo aap chah rahe ho ton me wo to mere liye abhi available nahi hai hamare pass. To ek bar mai wohi chahiye mere ko 500 kg me mai supply nahi kar paunga.
Executive: Mai sir Vidushi ko ek bar bol deti hu ki wo aapko leads kuch aapki shortlist karke aap ek bar trade.indiamart.com bhi aapne waha se leads kabhi search kariye sir?
Customer: Search kariye hai usme bhi nahi aati hai.
Executive: Achcha. Kyuki wo depend karta hai sir buyer ki agar requirement available hogi to buyer aapko wo definitely aapko wo lead milegi. Thik hai but fir bhi mai aapke liye ek bar Vidushi ko bol deti hu ki wo aapko kuch lead shortlist karke halki si quantity ki aapko share karegi jo bhi aapki requirement hai. Mere ko mere ko quantity se issue nahi hai ki aap 17 lead bhejo 20 lead bhejo mere ko aap ek hi bhejo na lekin 20 ton ki bhejo minimum.
Executive: Achcha achcha minimum 20 ton requirement. Ha.
Executive: Achcha aur jo direct inquiry apne pass aati hai usme se koi aisi inquiry aayi sir jo achche order quantity ki ho apne pass?
Customer: Bhai jo mere purpose ki hai to mai usko consume karta hu usse discuss karta hu.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Ha. Number of lead se mere ko matlab nahi hai na.
Executive: Sir mai aapki baat se agree hu. But abhi jaise direct inquiry me agar kisi ne quantity mention nahi kiya hai sir unhone itna likha hai ki I am interested in 98% natural red oxygen powder karke thik hai to aap ispe call back karte ho mai karti hu call ek bar hello.
Customer: Mere ko jo lagta hai mai usme mere ko jo lagta hai ki ha ye lead mere kaam ki hai mai usko consume karta hu usse discuss karta hu.
Executive: Bas ek second. Hmm. Ha follow up leta hu feedback leta hu.
Executive: But but waisa kuch response nikal ke nahi aaya abhi aapko sir?
Customer: Nahi abhi nahi aaya.
Executive: Thik hai chaliye mai aapke liye karwa dungi ki aapke liye Vidushi ko bol dungi fir bhi wo aapko lead share karegi kyuki kya hai na sir sare system AI based hai jis tarah ki hum lead consume karte hai waise hi aapko lead waha show hoti hai agar ye hai ki do teen lead agar hum week me mai bhijwa dungi agar relevant leads aati hai to agar aap wo consume karoge aapke purchasing pattern me wo minimum order quantity add ho jayegi to aapko fir waise hi leads aana start ho jayegi. Thik hai abhi dekhiye kya hai na sir. Thik hai sir kya ho raha hai na abhi jo aap lead consume kar rahe hai ab jaise aapne last me 8 November ko lead consume kari thi jo ki 25 50 kg ki thi thik hai then fir red or powder ki aapne quantity 30 thi jo ki order value bhi iski 20 se 50000 hai uske baad ek aur aapne consume kari hai 29 October ko 25 kg ki to wo wahi hai ki low order quantity consume karne ki wajah se waha pe leads bhi usi tarike ki aa rahi hai sir.
Customer: Mere pass kya ho raha hai?
Customer: Are jab aap itna bolte hai ki lead consume kariye fir bolte hai aapne 25 kg ki kariye isliye 20 ton ki nahi aa rahi hai mai kya karu bataiye.
Executive: Sir wo consume karna sahi hai lekin wo hai ki kya hai purchasing pattern me wo add ho jata hai mai ek bar aapko share karwati hu agar lead waha pe available hai achche order quantity ki to aapka wo purchasing pattern create ho jayega.
Customer: Abhi ek taraf aap bolte hai bhai sample me koi bulayega 50 kilo 25 kilo kya karu mai aap bataiye.
Executive: To sir matlab agar aapke local se bhi itne 50 kg wali ki leads aati hai to tab bhi possible hai.
Customer: Local ki nahi hai.
Customer: Local ki nahi hai ab Jaipur ya other state me 50 kilo kaise bhejunga maal local mere ko Jabalpur ki aur ki lead to aayegi nahi 50 kilo to mai local bhi nahi de paunga.
Executive: Achcha local me bhi fir kitna hoga aapka?
Customer: Mai ton se niche deal nahi karta.
Executive: Kitna sir?
Customer: Local me bhi mai minimum ek ton se complete nahi karta.
Executive: Achcha ek ton se deal karte hai.
Customer: Ha wohi cheez to mai samjhana chah raha hu har bar wohi discussion hota hai.
Executive: Achcha chaliye mai local me location filter lagwa ke bhi agar ha ek ton tak ki bhi local me bhi agar aapko rahegi to wo bhi mai waha pe bhijwa dungi sir.
Customer: Madam aap plain India dalo minimum 20 ton dalo local me nahi hai utni demand mere product ki.
Executive: Achcha.
Customer: Ha.
Executive: Thik hai sir. Thik hai baki ka baki ka catalog pe to aapko kam kar hi rahi hai aapke catalog quality score bhi aapka 76% hai aur review and rating bhi mai check kar rahi hu five ki rating hai aapki. Sir waise pata hai aapko waha se aap hum buyer se aur rating achchi le sakte hai apni?
Customer: Wo mai kaise bata sakta hu aapko?
Executive: Nahi nahi nahi nahi jaise mai aapko guide kar rahi hu jo bhi aapke pass buyer ki requirement aati hai matlab buyer ki direct inquiry aati hai waha pe hum reply karte hai hamare ek option rehta hai ask for review and rating ka to jo bhi aapke pass inquiry aa rahi hai na uspe aap wo link jarur share kijiye aur buyer se boliyega ki aapki rating aapki catalog ko de sir apni rating bhi badhti hai aur apni catalog ki visibility bhi impact karta hai sir.
Executive: Okay sure.
Executive: To wo rating aap waha se koshish kijiyega ha wo rating badhaiyega baki ka mai aapka ye ticket tha aisa mai close kar dungi isi ke sath abhi?
Customer: Thik hai.
Executive: Thik hai mai Vidushi ko bolti hu ek bar aapko WhatsApp pe lead wagera share karegi sir on priority basis pe. Ha jarur karegi. To quantity jarur mention boliyega kare. Sure sir sure sir aur koi issue aata hai to aap ye number bhi save kar sakte hai aap directly mujhe bhi connect kar sakte hai sir.
Customer: Ab aap har bar to aap manager change kar dete hai aur mai kis kis se discuss karu.
Executive: Nahi aap Vidushi aapki manager hai mai uski manager bol rahi thi mai bola in case agar aapko lagta hai ki Vidushi nahi aapko respond. Mai aapki baat mai aapki baat samajh gaya isse pehle aur koi tha usse itni sab discussion fir repeat hogi wo cheez mai bol raha hu jab aapko mere account manager same rahega mere ko problem unko pata hogi ki meri kya hai to usi pe discussion hogi bar bar.
Executive: Hmm hmm hmm. Koi nahi mai Vidushi ko bol dungi koi bhi call karne se pehle ek bar ticket history ya jo bhi sir ne feedback share ki hoti hai wo thoda sa cross check kar le taki aapse baat karne me bhi usko rahega ki ha kya aapka feedback tha kya resolve hua better hai ki puchne se achcha sir kya issue aa raha hai kya nahi aa raha.
Executive: Thik hai.
Executive: Thik hai. Chaliye sir mai aapka ye feedback close kar rahi hu aap
summary:
Concerns:

- Account manager changes frequently.

- Wants leads of minimum 20 tons.

- Dissatisfied with the services.



Resolution:

- Executive assured to share leads on WhatsApp.

- Executive will inform Vidushi to cross-check feedback.

- Executive explained about review and rating option.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will close the ticket.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- account manager, leads, quantity, feedback, rating
